tasks.name: Season the Patties
tasks.description: Use salt, pepper, and grape seed oil (or vegetable oil) to season the beef patty. Leave the meat to rest and don't let the meat be cold.

tasks.name: Heat up the Frying Pan
tasks.description: Heat up the pan (or grill) piping hot.

tasks.name: Cook the meat
tasks.description: Let the meat sear in the pan. Flip it twice and no more.

tasks.name: Cook the bun
tasks.description: There is nothing worse than a soggy bun. Flip the bun once.

tasks.name: Cut the onions
tasks.description: Peel the onions and cut them in nice circular shape.

tasks.name: Season the onions
tasks.description: Use salt and pepper on the onions.

tasks.name: Cook the onions
tasks.description: Caramelize the onion on the pan.

tasks.name: Place the lettuce
tasks.description: Break the lettuce in half and place it on the burger in good shape.

tasks.name: Cut the tomato
tasks.description: Cut the tomato in circular shapes.

tasks.name: Place the tomato
tasks.description: Place the tomato on the bun and add a little bit of salt & pepper.

tasks.name: Make honey-mustard & mayo sauce
tasks.description: Mix mayonnaise and honey mustard for a tasty burger sauce.

tasks.name: Spread sauce on bread
tasks.description: Spread the sauce on both sides of the bun.

tasks.name: Brush butter on the patties
tasks.description: With a brush, touch the patties gently with a little bit of butter.

tasks.name: Put cheddar cheese on the patties
tasks.description: Place cheddar cheese on the cooking patties and rest until it melts.

tasks.name: Place patty on the burger
tasks.description: With care, place the cooked patty on the burger.

tasks.name: Place the onion on the burger
tasks.description: With care, place the caramelized onion on top of the patty.

tasks.name: Close the top bun and serve
tasks.description: Close the top bun of the burger and place the burger on a dish to serve.
